short_summary: The Embassy of Canada to Greece requires cleaning services
description: provides a detailed description of the requirement for cleaning services for the Embassy locations as per industry standards

full_summary:
**Title (English/French):** 
* Cleaning Services for the Embassy of Canada to Greece
* Services de nettoyage pour l’Ambassade du Canada en Grèce
**Reference Number (English/French):** 
* PW-22-01006106
* Référence PW-22-01006106
**Amendment Number (English/French):** 
* 3
* Numéro de modification 3
**Publication Date (English/French):** 
* 2022-09-02
* Date de publication 2022-09-02

The Embassy of Canada to Greece is seeking a contractor to provide routine cleaning services for its representative space, common areas, and work spaces occupied by staff. The scope of work includes all necessary labour, cleaning materials, tools, and equipment to maintain cleanliness and decent working conditions for the occupants.

**Closing Date (English/French):** 
* 2022-10-03T14:00:00
* Date d'appel d'offres clôture 2022-10-03 - 14:00 heures
**Trade Agreements (English/French):** 
* This tender is open to bidders who have entered into the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

**Contracting Entity (English/French):** 
* Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
* Affaires étrangères, du commerce et du développement (Ministère des)

Contact:
Raymond, Claude
Internationalproposals@international.gc.ca

**Attachments (English/French):** 
* Addendum 1
* Addendum 2
* RFP – ATHNS Final
* Addendum 1 – ATHNS
Documentation is available on the [Canadabuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

Note: 
* The Embassy of Canada to Greece
